charges.charge_description: 21:846=MD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA (Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute 100 Kilograms or more of Marihuana)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft. sentenced to (40) Months to Run Concurrent as to Count 1 &; Count 2; (4) Four Years of Supervised Release to Run Concurrently with Count 1 &; Count 2; No Fine; $100.00 S/A on each Count 1 &; 2 for a Total of $200.00

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=MD.F MARIJUANA - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE &; (18:USC 2 Aiding &; Abetting)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft. sentenced to (40) Months to Run Concurrent as to Count 1 &; Count 2; (4) Four Years of Supervised Release to Run Concurrently with Count 1 &; Count 2; No Fine; $100.00 S/A on each Count 1 &; 2 for a Total of $200.00
